info.name: PC Mag - Marc's Dark Theme
info.description:
Quick Dark Theme for PC Mag.</br>
</br>
Cannot seem to get users' names to change color in comments
info.additionalInfo:
Update 05/09/2018
 - Fixed author background
 - Fixed item price background (Price at top)
 - Fixed item summary box background at the bottom of article
 - Changed background 3 color a bit
 - Changed main background color a bit
 - Added a 4th background color
 - Added transparency to some price text backgrounds
 - Updated social media buttons, both at the top, and on the side when reading an article

Update 01/17/2018
 - Fixed background colors of social media buttons on left side of screen.
 - Fixed background on item price at top and bottom of page
 - Fixed Similar Products backgrounds
 - Fixed About Author backgrounds

Update 11/20/2017
 - Fixed Text color for "//Categories"

Update 10/18/2017
 - Changed background-color-second to be much darker
 - Darkened navigation dropdown menus.
 - Converted whole page "Subscribe" pop up to a slightly transparent black.
 - Converted a few pieces of black text
